trends: There has been one other sighting in Ola
There were no other sightings in Ola on or around March 7th 2006
divs: Sighting Details About one year ago My son, who is 19 yrs old now and myself , I'm 50 yrs old, was in the wood behind our house around noon and we seen a pail blue ball about 30 ft away from us, we had been walking back towards our house when we suddenly stopped and turned around to look back the way we had just came through, It was about 3 ft off the ground it was sky blue and about 2 ft in diameter. It darted behind a tree that was about 25 ft to our right, we have not seen it sense that time. It was not an animal, i.e, squirel or turkey.It was aware of us and we seemed to have startled it by turning around quick like we did, classic Wil O'wisp, we think it was some kind of extraterrestrial being or craft.
